description: This simple, tangy apple sauce takes no time to make and freezes brilliantly. Essential with roast pork.

default: 225g/8oz cooking apples, peeled, cored and chopped

steps: Put the apples in a saucepan with the lemon zest and water. Cover and cook over a low heat until they are soft and mushy.
Take off the heat and beat in the butter and the sugar. Cool.
title: Apple sauce
